author: lecriste
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces an associator between SimClusters and TICL Tracksters. Among other usages, it will be used for HGCAL validation based on Tracksters in place of the current MultiClusters. No changes are expected in the output.

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix -l limited`
title: [HGCAL] Tracksters to SimClusters associator
